points.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
points.status: One single A4 sheet, divided into columns.

points.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
points.status: The Privacy Policy states "All information and supporting documentation that you share with us will be held securely and will never by disclosed to a third party without your prior written agreement."

points.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
points.status: The Privacy Policy states "There is no requirement to provide us with any personal information if you want to use the free online information resource on our website."

points.title: This service does not track you
points.status: The Privacy Policy states "We’ve designed our website www.GetRentBack.org so that you can visit without having to register or provide us with any personal information: we want you to benefit from our free information resource on tenant rights and Rent Repayment Orders."

points.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties
points.status: The Cookie pop-up menu displays checkboxes for the user to opt out of third party cookie tracking. If all available boxes are unticked by the user, the only cookie which is kept is the one which stores these user preferences.

points.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
points.status: The Privacy Policy states "Flat Justice recognises that individuals have the right to access their personal data and can make a request verbally or in writing. If we receive a subject access request asking what information is held about them, we will deal with the request without undue delay and at the latest within one month of receipt."

points.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website
points.status: In addition, the user may opt out of all cookie tracking except the one cookie which tracks the user's cookie preferences.

points.title: This service does not sell your personal data
points.status: The Privacy Policy states "Flat Justice will never sell, rent, or lease your personally identifiable information to others.". Note: FlatJustice is the community interest company which owns the GetRentBack website.
